subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Oilers lost a three-goal lead and their starting goaltender, Dwayne Roloson, for the remainder of the playoffs in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: The Oilers lost a three-goal lead and their starting goaltender, Dwayne Roloson, for the remainder of the playoffs in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals.
